divs: Sighting Detailsit seemed to follow the power lines. i saw it while driving 40mph.as i slowed down to look it followed power lines. in opposite direction and disapeared.it seemed very flat there were two small exhaust trails coming from rear.It was kind of a pentagram shape with 4 0r five lights. i thought it was someone plaYING a joke with a kite. other car were around but didnt seem to see it.
